About Me Why Tech? Hobbies

About Me

My name is Joanna. I am 27 years old and I am from Poland. I have master degree in Civil Engineering and currently work as an Architect. I am highly self-motivated, focused and innovative person with experience in engineering design. I have a passion for learning and developing new and existing skills. I love creating new things and I really enjoy solving problems.

Why Tech?

I would like to start a career as a web developer because of the many advantages. Web development can gives me the opportunity to express myself creatively on the internet. I also love problem solving and that is something technology requires.

There is a huge demand for technology right now and you could choose a company that really suits your needs. If you are good enough you can have a good income.

Next advantage is that you can work from anywhere. Of course not all jobs are remote, but I am pretty sure there are many companies that accept this. This is wonderful that you can have freedom to work wherever you want from.

  • Travelling
